Title: Dungeon story
Credits:
Welcome back to the real world :)

Created by Tien Le (ticale@ucsc.edu).

ThroneRoom.Body:
You are in a room that, at one point in time, was on the cutting edge of royal fashion.

The interior still, at first glance, retains an impression of lavishness, though upon further examination one can see that various elements are missing or defaced, having had their gold finish scraped off or their various encrusted jewels pocketed.

Raised considerably on a platform near the back of the room, a resplendent throne stlil somehow sporting its scarlet lining commands attention as the focal point of the room.

A half-exposed portal sits behind the throne, with not even a flicker of magic peeking through the sheet draped over it.

Choices.Text: Go through the door marked kitchen
Go through the door marked storage
Go through the door marked treasury

Kitchen.Body:
An ancient kitchen, with every surface variably caked in soot and dust.

A large firepit sits in the middle of the room, previously the center of operations.

Storage.Body: A cool room full of shelves, crates, and mysterious tarped objects.

Treasury.Body:
Your torch fills the room with a warm glow.

This room must have once contained the old royals' power. There isn't much left now.
